wikitext.*:
'''AYA(R)''' is a [[Primitive Quendian]] [[Sundocarme|root]] signifying "sea".<ref>{{PE|Eldarin}}, p. 149 (form appearing as "√AYA(R)")</ref>

==Other versions of the Legendarium==

In the ''[[The Etymologies|Etymologies]]'' appears the root ÁYAR-, AIR- (with an [[Wikipedia:Inverted breve|inverted breve below]] on the "I") signifying "sea, only used of the inner seas of Middle-earth", derived from root [[AY|AY-]]. The root yields the [[Quenya]] derivatives ''ear (earen)'', ''aire (airen)'', and [[Noldorin]] ''oear, oer''.<ref name=Ety>{{LR|Etymologies}}, p. 349</ref><ref>{{VT|45a }}, p. 6</ref>
